languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссия Касбаллики{/g} — криминальный синдикат, подмявший под себя весь хладный торг в секторе. Спрос на творения {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} широк, и на каждой колонии найдется по парочке их агентов. Препятствовать их торговым интересам куда опаснее, чем пользоваться их товарами".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссия Касбаллики{/g} — криминальный синдикат, подмявший под себя весь Хладный Торг в секторе. Спрос на творения {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} широк, и на каждой колонии найдется по парочке их агентов. Препятствовать их торговым интересам куда опаснее, чем пользоваться их товарами".

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссия Касбаллики{/g} — криминальный синдикат, подмявший под себя весь хладный торг в секторе. Спрос на творения {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} широк, и на каждой колонии найдется по парочке их агентов. Препятствовать их торговым интересам куда опаснее, чем пользоваться их товарами".

traits.locale_text: "The Kasballica Mission — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. Creations of xenos are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

"The Kasballica Mission — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. Creations of xenos are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

"The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. Xenos creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

"The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. Xenos creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

"The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}…この星域の闇取引の支配権を丸々掌握した犯罪組織。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の創造物は需要が高いから、どのコロニーにもカスバリカの諜報員がひとりかふたりはいる。奴らの商業的利益に逆らうことは、奴らの商品取引を利用するよりもはるかに危険だ」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}…この星域の闇取引の支配権を丸々掌握した犯罪組織。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の創造物は需要が高いから、どのコロニーにもカスバリカの諜報員がひとりかふたりはいる。奴らの商業的利益に逆らうことは、奴らの商品取引を利用するよりもはるかに危険だ」

languages.text: “掌握在{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}手中，这个犯罪集团控制了扩区所有的冷市贸易。由于{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}造物的需求非常庞大，每个殖民地都有一到两位卡斯巴利卡的代理人。若是阻碍了他们的商业利益，恐怕比使用他们的商品还要危险得多。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

traits.locale_text: “掌握在{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}手中，这个犯罪团伙控制了扩区所有的冷市贸易。由于{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}造物的需求非常庞大，每个殖民地都有一到两位卡斯巴利卡的代理人。若是阻碍了他们的商业利益，恐怕比使用他们的商品还要危险得多。”

languages.text: «La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Misión Kasballica{/g}, un sindicato de delincuentes que se ha hecho con el control de todo el Comercio Frío de este sector. Las creaciones de los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} se venden solas, por lo que no hay colonia sin uno o dos agentes de la Kasballica. Resulta mucho más peligroso usar su mercancía que oponerse a sus intereses comerciales».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

traits.locale_text: «La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Misión Kasballica{/g}, un sindicato de delincuentes que se ha hecho con el control de todo el Comercio Frío de este sector. Las creaciones de los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} se venden solas, por lo que no hay colonia sin uno o dos agentes de la Kasballica. Resulta mucho más peligroso usar su mercancía que oponerse a sus intereses comerciales».

languages.text: « La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, un syndicat criminel qui a pris le contrôle de l'intégralité du Commerce Froid dans le secteur. Les créations des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} étant très demandées, la Kasballica place toujours au moins un agent ou deux dans chaque colonie. Il est bien plus dangereux de s'opposer à leurs intérêts que d'utiliser leurs marchandises. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

traits.locale_text: « La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, un syndicat criminel qui a pris le contrôle de l'intégralité du Commerce Froid dans le secteur. Les créations des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} étant très demandées, la Kasballica place toujours au moins un agent ou deux dans chaque colonie. Il est bien plus dangereux de s'opposer à leurs intérêts que d'utiliser leurs marchandises. »

languages.text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} – ein Verbrechersyndikat, das den gesamten Kalthandel im Sektor unter seine Kontrolle gebracht hat. Für {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Schöpfungen ist die Nachfrage groß, darum gibt es in jeder Kolonie einen oder zwei Agenten der Kasballica. Sich gegen ihre Geschäftsinteressen zu stellen, ist viel gefährlicher, als ihre Waren zu benutzen."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

traits.locale_text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} – ein Verbrechersyndikat, das den gesamten Kalthandel im Sektor unter seine Kontrolle gebracht hat. Für {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Schöpfungen ist die Nachfrage große, darum gibt es in jeder Kolonie einen oder zwei Agenten der Kasballica. Sich gegen ihre Geschäftsinteressen zu stellen, ist viel gefährlicher, als ihre Waren zu benutzen."

languages.text: "Sektördeki tüm Soğuk Ticaret'in kontrolünü ele geçiren suç örgütü {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu'nda{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} icatları yüksek talep gördüğünden her kolonide bir iki Kasballica ajanına rastlanır. Ticari çıkarlarına karşı çıkmak, mallarını kullanmaktan çok daha tehlikelidir."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — a criminal syndicate that has seized control of the entirety of the Cold Trade in the sector. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} creations are in high demand, and so every single colony has a Kasballican agent or two. Opposing their commercial interests is a lot more dangerous than using their merchandise."

traits.locale_text: "Sektördeki tüm Soğuk Ticaret'in kontrolünü ele geçiren suç örgütü {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g}'nda. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} yaratımları yüksek talep görüyor, bu nedenle her kolonide bir veya iki Kasballica ajanına rastlanır. Ticari çıkarlarına karşı çıkmak, mallarını kullanmaktan çok daha tehlikelidir."
